price: Anaasε wͻ’ka sε, (Nkͻmhyεni) no ara na abͻ netrim (atwerε Qur’aan no)? Daabi, gye na wͻnnye nnie.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna taqawwalahu bal lā yu'minūna
